arts.sum: Lazio will be hoping to take a significant step towards the Europa League quarter-finals when they take on Viktoria Plzen in the first leg of the Round of 16. The encounter will take place at the Doosan Arena in Plzen, Czech Republic. It kicks off on Thursday at 21:00 CET.
